Sentencas: Solid oxide cells represent one of the most efficient and promising electrochemical technologies for hydrogen energy conversion.
Titulo: Early-Stage Detection of Solid Oxide Cells Anode Degradation by Operando Impedance Analysis

Sentencas: Understanding and monitoring degradation is essential for their full development and wide diffusion.
Titulo: Early-Stage Detection of Solid Oxide Cells Anode Degradation by Operando Impedance Analysis

Sentencas: Techniques based on electrochemical impedance spectroscopy and distribution of relaxation times of physicochemical processes occurring in solid oxide cells have attracted interest for the operando diagnosis of degradation.
Titulo: Early-Stage Detection of Solid Oxide Cells Anode Degradation by Operando Impedance Analysis

Sentencas: This research paper aims to validate the methodology developed by the authors in a previous paper, showing how such a diagnostic tool may be practically implemented.
Titulo: Early-Stage Detection of Solid Oxide Cells Anode Degradation by Operando Impedance Analysis

Sentencas: The validation methodology is based on applying an a priori known stress agent to a solid oxide cell operated in laboratory conditions and on the discrete measurement and deconvolution of electrochemical impedance spectra.
Titulo: Early-Stage Detection of Solid Oxide Cells Anode Degradation by Operando Impedance Analysis

Sentencas: Finally, experimental evidence obtained from a fully operando approach was counterchecked through ex-post material characterization.
Titulo: Early-Stage Detection of Solid Oxide Cells Anode Degradation by Operando Impedance Analysis
